abstract: Last week viewers pored over four iPhone commercials with Talmudic intensity, trying to determine precisely how the phone will operate.
snippet: Last week viewers pored over four iPhone commercials with Talmudic intensity, trying to determine precisely how the phone will operate.
lead_paragraph: These days advertisers fret over DVR owners fast-forwarding through their commercials, but that was far from the case with the release by Apple last week of four iPhone commercials, which viewers pored over with Talmudic intensity.

headline.main: A Few Details of the iPhone Galvanize the Apple Cadre
headline.print_headline: A Few Details of the iPhone Galvanize the Apple Cadre
